kiyana deya haraha sama winadi 40 kata sarayak aluth lipi soya meheyumak arabayi 4.aluth lipi athnam ema thorathuru lankiya sithuwili thula gabada karaganiyi 5.lipiya liyu welawa anuwa pela gasma dakwayi yodagath thakshanaya

wanijakaranaya kiyanne ada api jiwath wena samaja kramaya (mekata dhanawadaya kiyala kiyanawa) thula thiyana aniwarya lakshanayak.purwa dhanawadi yugawala gaurawayen salakunu dewal hamadeyakma hudu weladamak bawata path karana eka dhanawadaya wisin sidukala.athithaye game weda mahatha kiyanne mudal matha nonasena ekthara andamaka gaurawaniya bhumikawak.namuth dhanawadaya wisin waidya wruththiya kiyana eka hudu mudalmaya sabadathawayak bawata pathkala.warthamana waidyawaraya yanu thamanta labena pitarata sawariya wenuwen aushadha samagam udesa rogin ugas karannek bawata pathwenne ee nisa.guruwarayage athitha paurushaya gilihila tiyushan ekata lamayi adda ganima wenuwen kunuharupa kiyana,moda wihilu karana jokarayange thathwayata ema wruththiya pathwela thiyenne ee nisa.
me sambandhayen mata hithena de prashnawaliyak lesin melesa dakwiya haka.
